name: facenet
description: FaceNet is for easy face recognition, verification, and clustering.

scripts.dist: npm run clean && tsc && shx cp src/*.py dist/src/
scripts.download:models: mkdir models && cd models && curl -L https://github.com/zixia/facenet/releases/download/v0.1.9/model-20170512.tar.bz2 | tar jxv && cd -
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:py
scripts.lint:ts: tslint --project tsconfig.json --type-check && npm run clean && tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:py: . python3/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH='src/:python3/facenet/src/' pylint src/*.py && npm run lint:flake8 && npm run lint:mypy
scripts.postinstall: npm run venv && npm run download:facenet && npm run download:models
scripts.start: echo `npm run demo` to show a demo.
scripts.test: npm run test:py && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:npm: export TMPDIR=/tmp/npm-package-test.$$ && npm pack && mkdir $TMPDIR && mv *-*.*.*.tgz $TMPDIR && cp tests/fixtures/facenet-smoke-testing.js $TMPDIR && cd $TMPDIR && npm init -y && npm i *-*.*.*.tgz && node facenet-smoke-testing.js
scripts.venv: python3 -m venv python3 && . python3/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt

author: Huan LI <zixia@zixia.net>
